column5: Hey guys, I'm making the trip to the soo late august and am hoping to get out on the big lake if the weather cooperates.  There are a few offshore shoals that look interesting and would love to hear from anyone who has tried jigging lakers around there successfully or otherwise. Any tips would be appreciated too.
tried last year and wasnt lucky on the big lake but smashed a bunch on the river. I know and inexpensive but good guide if your interested. Tim Prisel   [email protected] is all I have...
That's my uncle Tim. I remember your trip with him Shloim. Small world.... Fire him an email Bl8ant.  TDunn
Wow, thanks so much guys—will do!
